headline: Bogus Image
abstract: The image, shared on Twitter by Representative Paul Gosar of Arizona, is photoshopped and has been circulating online for years.
lead_paragraph: False. As lawmakers in Washington and allies around the world grappled with President Trump’s decision to launch a strike that killed Iran’s most important general, an Arizona Republican, Representative Paul Gosar, shared a fake image from his personal Twitter account on Monday purporting to show President Barack Obama shaking hands with President Hassan Rouhani of Iran. The two men have never met in person.
